name: CRIMO Stories
description:
Who doesn't love a good crime story? And how about a great PUZZLE game of logic and deduction? With CRIMO Stories, you get both!

Join the CRIMO team to unfold deep, suspenseful criminal investigations in Miami USA.

Search crime scenes with Andy Chan, the geeky forensic expert who also makes the worst jokes. Call on to Ruby May and her computer wizardry to churn through databases and narrow down the leads. Meet Peter Fontaine, the nicest of detectives with his Frenchy manners — what will be his next blunder? Rest assured, you can always trust Dana Diaz, the charismatic and brilliant leader of this friendly — and effective — team of detectives, to uncover the truth and bring criminals to justice!

Play addictive PUZZLES based on the mesmerizing rules of Nonogram Picross grids.

Use your logic to solve the puzzles. After a short training at CRIMO HQ, you will be ready to apply pure logic to solve puzzles and investigate in the real world. Easy to learn but hard to master: use your wits and deduction skills to fight crime!

CRIMO's puzzles offer a fascinating cross-over between games of logic like sudoku and minesweeper, crosswords and criminal investigation board games. It’s a real mind challenge wrapped in a fun experience where you need to think and use your brain to succeed.
Based on the rules known as PICROSS, NONOGRAM or GRIDDLER, these puzzles are highly addictive and fun, and we offer the best selection of grids ever seen, with difficulties ranging from super easy to excruciatingly hard to solve. And we let you choose at which level you want to play: Perfect.

You will learn easily, progress rapidly and quickly get hooked! It's ultra addictive!

FEATURES:
• New criminal cases to solve every few weeks with new suspects, places, witnesses, clues, mysteries, cliffhangers, dramatic turns of events and whatnot… and always the CRIMO team to accompany you, every step of the way
• Tens of collectibles to enrich your experience of CRIMO lore, memories and slice of life to the rescue…
• Rich and colourful graphics to please your eyes and keep you coming back for more
• 3 levels of puzzle challenge — EASY, NORMAL and HARD
• Hundreds of grid puzzles to solve by logic and deduction
• Made for iPhone and iPad

Time to solve puzzling crimes by logic & deduction! PLAY NOW!


—————————————
CRIMO Stories is free, but virtual currency can be purchased with real money to get some in-game items. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
